mapper.select: select room from optician where DATE_FORMAT(create_time, "%Y-%m-%d") = #{value}

select `id`,`card_number`,`ptometry_number`,`optometry_name`,`create_time`,`referral_doctor`,`referral`,`chief_complaint`,`sphere_righttry`, `sphere_lefttry`,`cylinder_righttry`,`cylinder_lefttry`,`axial_righttry`,`axial_lefttry`,`dva_righttry`,`dva_lefttry`,`nva_righttry`,`nva_lefttry`, `prism_righttry`,`prism_lefttry`,`jdr_try`,`jdl_try`,`height_righttry`,`height_lefttry`,`add_righttry`,`add_lefttry`,`yuan_rrty`,`yuan_lrty`, `near_righttry`,`near_lefttry`,`remarks`,`far_lyou`,`far_lyod`,`far_lyos`,`near_lyou`,`near_lyod`,`near_lyos`,`far_yjou`,`far_yjod`,`far_yjos`, `near_yjou`,`near_yjod`,`near_yjos`,`far_xkou`,`far_xkod`,`far_xkos`,`near_xkou`,`near_xkod`,`near_xkos`,`dominant_eye`,`axis`,`axis_left`, `corneal_first_K1_right`,`corneal_last_K1_right`,`corneal_first_K1_left`,`corneal_last_K1_left`,`corneal_first_K2_right`,`corneal_last_K2_right`, `corneal_first_K2_left`,`corneal_last_K2_left`,`pkod`,`pkos`,`pk1od`,`pk1os`,`dkod`,`dkos`,`dk1os`,`dk1od`,`pjk_od`,`pjk_os`,`pjk_od2`,`pjk_os2`, `intraocular_od`,`intraocular_os`,`mydriasis`,`pharmacy_id`,`pharmacy`,`sphere_right`, `sphere_left`,`cylinder_right`,`cylinder_left`,`axial_right`,`axial_left`,`corneal_astigmatism_od`,`corneal_astigmatism_os`,`sph_jyod`,`sph_jyos`, `cyl_jyod`,`cyl_jyos`,`axial_jyod`,`axial_jyos`,`va_jyod`,`va_jyos`,`pd_jyod`,`pd_jyos`,`sph_cpod`,`sph_cpos`,`cyl_cpod`,`cyl_cpos`,`axial_cpod`, `axial_cpos`,`dva_cpod`,`dva_cpos`,`nva_cpod`,`nva_cpos`,`add_cpod`,`add_cpos`,`distance_od`,`distance_os`, `sphere_rightz`,`sphere_leftz`,`cylinder_rightz`,`cylinder_leftz`,`axial_rightz`,`axial_leftz`,`dva_rightz`,`dva_leftz`,`nva_rightz`, `nva_leftz`,`prism_rightz`,`prism_leftz`,`jdr_z`,`jdl_z`,`add_rightz`,`add_leftz`,`yuan_rz`,`yuan_lz`,`near_rightz`,`near_leftz`,`sgn_sf`,`sgn_reason`, `sgn_ciss`,`sgn_fardot`,`sgn_neardot`,`sgn_farsp1`,`sgn_farsp2`,`sgn_farcz1`,`sgn_farcz2`,`sgn_nearsp1`,`sgn_nearsp2`,`sgn_nearcz1`,`sgn_nearcz2`, `sgn_vgfarsp1`,`sgn_vgfarsp2`,`sgn_vgnearsp1`,`sgn_vgnearsp2`,`sgn_vgfarcz1`,`sgn_vgfarcz2`,`sgn_vgnearcz1`,`sgn_vgnearcz2`,`sgn_allygytj1`, `sgn_allygytj2`,`sgn_ac`,`sgn_acway`,`sgn_tjfy`,`sgn_tjfyou`,`sgn_tjfyod`,`sgn_tjfyos`,`sgn_pra`,`sgn_nra`,`sgn_zfsf`,`sphere_right2`,`sphere_left2`, `cylinder_right2`,`cylinder_left2`,`axial_right2`,`axial_left2`,`tjod`,`tjos`,jc.`status`,`litishi` from jc_tryresults jc inner join sys_user su on jc.optometry_name=su.name
and jc.card_number = #{cardNumber} and jc.ptometry_number = #{ptometryNumber} and DATE_FORMAT(jc.create_time, "%Y-%m-%d") >= #{startTime} and DATE_FORMAT(jc.create_time, "%Y-%m-%d") <= #{endTime} and su.company_id=1

select jc.kjyy_id `kjyy_id`,jc.card_number `card_number`,ss.sale_number `sale_number`,jc.kjyy_prescription_type `kjyy_prescription_type`, jc.kjyy_doctor `kjyy_doctor`,jc.kjyy_optometry_name `kjyy_optometry_name`,jc.kjyy_sphod `kjyy_sphod`,jc.kjyy_sphos `kjyy_sphos`, jc.kjyy_cylod `kjyy_cylod`,jc.kjyy_cylos `kjyy_cylos`,jc.kjyy_axialod `kjyy_axialod`,jc.kjyy_axialos `kjyy_axialos`,jc.kjyy_prismod `kjyy_prismod`, jc.kjyy_prismos `kjyy_prismos`,jc.kjyy_jdod `kjyy_jdod`,jc.kjyy_jdos `kjyy_jdos`,jc.kjyy_yytjod `kjyy_yytjod`,jc.kjyy_yytjos `kjyy_yytjos`, jc.kjyy_tgod `kjyy_tgod`,jc.kjyy_tgos `kjyy_tgos`,jc.kjyy_vaod `kjyy_vaod`,jc.kjyy_vaos `kjyy_vaos`,jc.kjyy_jpcz `kjyy_jpcz`, jc.kjyy_clfs `kjyy_clfs`,jc.kjyy_jykj `kjyy_jykj`,jc.kjyy_kjlx `kjyy_kjlx`,jc.kjyy_text `kjyy_text`,jc.kjyy_beizhu `kjyy_beizhu` from jc_kjyy jc inner join store_sales ss on ss.ptometry_number=jc.ptometry_number inner join sys_user su on jc.kjyy_optometry_name=su.name
and jc.card_number = #{cardNumber} and jc.ptometry_number = #{ptometryNumber} and DATE_FORMAT(jc.create_time, "%Y-%m-%d") >= #{startTime} and DATE_FORMAT(jc.create_time, "%Y-%m-%d") <= #{endTime} and su.company_id=1

select jc.kjjy_id `kjjy_id`,jc.card_number `card_number`,ss.sale_number `sale_number`,jc.kjjy_prescription_type `kjjy_prescription_type`, jc.kjjy_doctor `kjjy_doctor`,jc.kjjy_optometry_name `kjjy_optometry_name`,jc.kjjy_sphod `kjjy_sphod`,jc.kjjy_sphos `kjjy_sphos`, jc.kjjy_cylod `kjjy_cylod`,jc.kjjy_cylos `kjjy_cylos`,jc.kjjy_axialod `kjjy_axialod`,jc.kjjy_axialos `kjjy_axialos`,jc.kjjy_prismod `kjjy_prismod`, jc.kjjy_prismos `kjjy_prismos`,jc.kjjy_jdod `kjjy_jdod`,jc.kjjy_jdos `kjjy_jdos`,jc.kjjy_yytjod `kjjy_yytjod`,jc.kjjy_yytjos `kjjy_yytjos`, jc.kjjy_tgod `kjjy_tgod`,jc.kjjy_tgos `kjjy_tgos`,jc.kjjy_vaod `kjjy_vaod`,jc.kjjy_vaos `kjjy_vaos`,jc.kjjy_jpcz `kjjy_jpcz`, jc.kjjy_clfs `kjjy_clfs`,jc.kjjy_jykj `kjjy_jykj`,jc.kjjy_kjlx `kjjy_kjlx`,jc.kjjy_text `kjjy_text`,jc.kjjy_beizhu `kjjy_beizhu` from jc_kjjy jc inner join store_sales ss on ss.ptometry_number=jc.ptometry_number inner join sys_user su on jc.kjjy_optometry_name=su.name
and jc.card_number = #{cardNumber} and jc.ptometry_number = #{ptometryNumber} and DATE_FORMAT(jc.create_time, "%Y-%m-%d") >= #{startTime} and DATE_FORMAT(jc.create_time, "%Y-%m-%d") <= #{endTime} and su.company_id=1

select jc.rx_id `rx_id`,jc.card_number `card_number`,ss.sale_number `sale_number`,jc.rx_prescription_type `rx_prescription_type`, jc.rx_doctor `rx_doctor`,jc.rx_optometry_name `rx_optometry_name`,jc.rx_bcod `rx_bcod`,jc.rx_bcos `rx_bcos`,jc.rx_sphod `rx_sphod`, jc.rx_sphos `rx_sphos`,jc.rx_cylod `rx_cylod`,jc.rx_cylos `rx_cylos`,jc.rx_axialod `rx_axialod`,jc.rx_axialos `rx_axialos`, jc.rx_zjod `rx_zjod`,jc.rx_zjos `rx_zjos`,jc.rx_vaod `rx_vaod`,jc.rx_vaos `rx_vaos`,jc.rx_syjpod `rx_syjpod`,jc.rx_syjpos `rx_syjpos`, jc.rx_unitod `rx_unitod`,jc.rx_unitos `rx_unitos`,jc.rx_clfs `rx_clfs`,jc.rx_hlypz `rx_hlypz`,jc.rx_beizhu `rx_beizhu` from jc_rxjmjcj jc inner join store_sales ss on ss.ptometry_number=jc.ptometry_number inner join sys_user su on jc.rx_optometry_name=su.name
and jc.card_number = #{cardNumber} and jc.ptometry_number = #{ptometryNumber} and DATE_FORMAT(jc.create_time, "%Y-%m-%d") >= #{startTime} and DATE_FORMAT(jc.create_time, "%Y-%m-%d") <= #{endTime} and su.company_id=1

select jc.sjxl_id `sjxl_id`,jc.card_number `card_number`,ss.sale_number `sale_number`,jc.sjxl_prescription_type `sjxl_prescription_type`, jc.sjxl_doctor `sjxl_doctor`,jc.sjxl_optometry_name `sjxl_optometry_name`,jc.sjxl_sphod `sjxl_sphod`,jc.sjxl_sphos `sjxl_sphos`, jc.sjxl_cylod `sjxl_cylod`,jc.sjxl_cylos `sjxl_cylos`,jc.sjxl_axialod `sjxl_axialod`,jc.sjxl_axialos `sjxl_axialos`,jc.sjxl_sljod `sjxl_sljod`, jc.sjxl_sljos `sjxl_sljos`,jc.sjxl_jdod `sjxl_jdod`,jc.sjxl_jdos `sjxl_jdos`,jc.sjxl_yytjod `sjxl_yytjod`,jc.sjxl_yytjos `sjxl_yytjos`,jc.sjxl_jytjod `sjxl_jytjod`, jc.sjxl_jytjos `sjxl_jytjos`,jc.sjxl_tgod `sjxl_tgod`,jc.sjxl_tgos `sjxl_tgos`,jc.sjxl_yyvaod `sjxl_yyvaod`,jc.sjxl_yyvaos `sjxl_yyvaos`, jc.sjxl_jyvaod `sjxl_jyvaod`,jc.sjxl_jyvaos `sjxl_jyvaos`,jc.sjxl_jtxl `sjxl_jtxl`,jc.sjxl_xlsxl `sjxl_xlsxl`,jc.sjxl_beizhu `sjxl_beizhu` from jc_sjxl jc inner join store_sales ss on ss.ptometry_number=jc.ptometry_number inner join sys_user su on jc.sjxl_optometry_name=su.name

and jc.card_number = #{cardNumber} and jc.ptometry_number = #{ptometryNumber} and DATE_FORMAT(jc.create_time, "%Y-%m-%d") >= #{startTime} and DATE_FORMAT(jc.create_time, "%Y-%m-%d") <= #{endTime} and su.company_id=1
